  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Naselitev alpskih Slovanov</string>
            <string language="en">Settling of Alpine Slavs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vereinbaren der alpinen Slavs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arrangement des Slaves alpestres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estabelecir-se de slavs alpine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sedimentazione degli slavs alpini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τακτοποίηση των αλπικών Σλάβων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El colocar de eslavos alpestres</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Praktični primer uporabe zgodovinskih virov pri učni uri Naselitev alpskih Slovanov.</string>
            <string language="en">How to organize lesson on arrival of Slavic people in the Alps and some worksheets to drill the presented learning material.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">alpe</string>
            <string language="en">alps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slovani</string>
            <string language="en">slavic peoples</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">karantanija</string>
            <string language="en">carantania</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man Lektion auf Ankunft der Slavic Leute in 
den Alpen und in einigen Bogen organisiert, um das dargestellte 
erlernenmaterial zu bohren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment organiser la leçon sur l'arrivée des  
slaves en Alpes et quelques tableaux pour forer le matériel 
d'étude présenté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como organizar a lição na chegada de povos de 
Slavic nos alpes e em algumas folhas para perfurar o material de 
aprendizagem apresentado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come organizzare lezione sull'arrivo della gente 
di Slavic in alpi ed alcuni fogli di lavoro per perforare il materiale
imparante presentato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να οργανώσει το μάθημα στην άφιξη των σλαβικών 
ανθρώπων στις Αλπεις και μερικά φύλλα εργασίας για να τρυπήσει 
το παρουσιασμένο υλικό εκμάθησης με τρυπάνι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo ordenar la lección en la llegada de la 
gente de Slavic en las montan@as y algunas hojas de trabajo para 
perforar el actual material que aprende.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alpen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">slavic Völker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">carantania</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">alpes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">peuples slavic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carantania</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alpes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">povos slavic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carantania</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alpi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gente slavic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carantania</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">όρη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σλαβικοί λαοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">carantania</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">montan@as</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gente slavic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carantania</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
